adding_a_new_quokka_device_will_unpair_t: Adding a new Quokka Device will unpair the Quokka paired before. Note that your Quokka will remain connected to the WiFi network.
addressability_for_all_quokkas_by_defaul: Addressability for all Quokkas by default (this can be change later)
bluetooth_not_enabled_on_device: Bluetooth not enabled on this device
bluetooth_not_supported_description:
This device does not support the required Bluetooth version to connect to Quokka Quantum.
Please use a different device.
bluetooth_not_supported_on_device: Bluetooth not supported on this device
choose_the_quokka_to_onboard_and_pair: Choose the Quokka to on-board and pair
choose_your_organization_name_or_quokka_: Choose your organization name or Quokka subdomain.
how_many_quokkas_do_you_wish_to_onboard: How many Quokkas do you wish to on-board?
individual_quokkas_with_the_same_subdoma: Individual Quokkas with the same subdomain will be registered sequentially.
make_sure_the_quokkas_you_wish_to_onboar: Make sure the Quokkas you wish to on-board are currently powered on and in the original factory settings
make_sure_your_bluetooth_is_switched_on: Make sure your bluetooth is switched on
make_sure_your_quokka_connected_to_power:
Make sure your Quokka is connected to power
and your Bluetooth is switched on
make_sure_your_quokka_is_connected_to_po: Make sure your Quokka is connected to power
start_device_pairing_page_description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur. Dui non nulla eget nullam etiam hac ultricies aliquet. Tincidunt libero.
the_previously_paired_quokka_device_will: The previously paired Quokka device will be unpaired. Note that your Quokka will remain connected to the WiFi network.
wifi_modal_connecting_description: Please wait while we connect it to your Wi-Fi network
wifi_modal_error_description: Couldn't connect to Wi-Fi network, Try again!
wifi_not_enabled_description: Wi-Fi not enabled on this device
wifi_not_supported_description:
Wi-Fi needs to be enabled in order to
connect your Quokka to the internet
you_are_adding_a_new_device: You are adding a new device
you_are_unpairing_the_quokka_device: You are unpairing the Quokka device
your_quokka_can_be_configured_to_allow_a: Your Quokka can be configured to allow accessibility over the internet. We can create a special subdomain for all your Quokkas so you can access them anywhere in the world
